name: Dipanshu Porwal
summary: Sr. AI and Python developer with 8 years of experience in the Manufacturing, Healthcare and Banking domains. Proven expertise in designing, modelling, implementing, testing and deploying scalable BOTs and Voice Assistants leveraging Agentic AI architectures, Gen AI frameworks, LLMs, prompt engineering, and NLP techniques. Seeking a similar role and position in a progressive organization where I can continue to drive innovation and AI-powered transformation.

experience.description: Designed and developed a production-grade hierarchical, multi-agent framework using LLMs. Validated function parameters in real-time and employed conversational memory. Architected intelligent voice assistant leveraging generative AI technologies. Led cross-functional teams, managed tasks, and ensured scalable deployment.

Implemented LLM-based bots for API and workflow automation. Built conversational bots and automated URL management processes, improving efficiency and user collaboration. Delivered customer-centric analytics dashboards and modular QnA components.
Developed and integrated various conversational bots for service catalogs, license reactivation, and document-based assistance using IBM Watson services and Python.
Coordinated with customers to address requirements, provided regular demos, and implemented feedback in bot solutions multiple client domains.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering

certifications.name: Building Al Agents & Agentic Al System via Microsoft Autogen
Machine Learning A-Z™ – Hands-On Python for Data Science
Certified in IBM Watson – Versions V3.1 & V4
CAIP – Accenture's Conversational AI Development Tool
